subject: Horses
Horsemanship and Equestrian Events
Olympic Games
Fires and Firefighters
Olympic Games (2012)
lead_paragraph: Neville Bardos, a 12-year-old horse who competes in eventing, has managed a competitive comeback from severe injuries sustained in a fire.
snippet: Neville Bardos, a 12-year-old horse who competes in eventing, has managed a competitive comeback from severe injuries sustained in a fire.
